summary: Four guys set off on a world tour to enact the seven deadly sins. Based on the MTV Europe series "Dirty Sanchez".
cast: Matthew Pritchard|Lee Dainton|Mike Locke|Dan Joyce|Mykel Hawke Pierce|Howard Marks|Elizabeth Tan|Kasumi Kitano|Ryuji Ito|Naoki Numazawa|Takashi Sasaki
title: Dirty Sanchez: The Movie
